projects.title: Quizzer Backend API
projects.description: Built and implemented a robust RESTful API to be consumed by React front end for managing quizzes allowing users to create, update and deleted quiz content.
projects.alt: Home page of a quiz application showing all of the created quizzes

projects.title: Blogger
projects.description: Blogger is a multi-user blog application where users can log in, view and publish posts.
projects.alt: Home page of a blog website showing all available blogs

projects.title: BookSwap
projects.description: Book Swap is a website that manages a communal bookshelf. Users can view and borrow books as well as return them.
projects.alt: Home page of a online bookshelf showing all available books that can be claimed
